        public static void sendMail(java.lang.String receiver,
                            java.lang.String urlConfirmation,
                            java.lang.String subject,
                            java.lang.String body)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method creates the session, it also specify the server properties and set the message and its content (that includes the receivers, the body of the mail...). Finally the method send the mail.
        Parameters:
        confirmationCode -
        receiver -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If a method exception occurred

      • createMessage

        private static javax.mail.Message createMessage(javax.mail.Session session,
                                                java.lang.String sender,
                                                java.lang.String receiver,
                                                java.lang.String urlConfirmation,
                                                java.lang.String subject,
                                                java.lang.String body)
                                         throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                                                javax.mail.MessagingException
        This method define who is the sender and receiver, it also specify the mail subject, body and attachment.
        Parameters:
        session - A session for the logged sender in Session format.
        sender - A sender which is going to send the email in string format.
        receiver - A receiver of the email in String format.
        confirmationCode - A code for confirm a user in String format.
        Returns:
        the email message in Message format
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - If an error with the address occurs
        javax.mail.MessagingException - If an error with the message occurs

      • getSession

        private static javax.mail.Session getSession(java.lang.String sender,
                                             java.lang.String password)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method get the session of the sender with authentication.
        Parameters:
        sender - A sender which is going to send the email in string format.
        password - The password of the sender email.
        Returns:
        the session in Session format
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error with the session occurs

      • getServerProperties

        private static java.util.Properties getServerProperties()
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method get the properties needed for the session (port, host...).
        Returns:
        the properties needed for the session (port and host).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error with the properties occurs
